body: Same happens when using an anonymous inner instance of `japi.Function[ActorRef, Object]` instead of the lambda.

Souldn't `PatternCS.def ask(actor: ActorRef, messageFactory: japi.Function[ActorRef, Any], timeout: Timeout): CompletionStage[AnyRef]` delegate to `ExplicitAskSupport.ask`. Currenlty it delegates to `AskSupport`. Happy to provide a PR.
Can't see how that ever has worked, no test coverage it seems. Would have expected a compiler warning about ambiguous overload though.
PR in the works ... why can't I assign myself?

issue.title: Fix broken explicit ask pattern for Java (closes #24587)

body:
> PR in the works ... why can't I assign myself?

Because github, write access people only can.
